Geek & Mild by Sean Sperte

Canned

A few weeks ago I called an emergency meeting at Sky Balloon HQ. The problem was I needed an app for a particular task, but all of the options available on the App Store at the time were … lacking.

I wanted a text message template app; something with which I could quickly launch, and send a text to my wife to let her know I was driving or in a meeting.

The men of the Balloon took up the cause, and today we have Canned, a light weight iPhone app for precomposed messages and pre-selected recipients.
